require 'aws-sdk-elasticbeanstalk' # v2: require 'aws-sdk' # Replace us-west-2 with the AWS Region you're using for Elastic Beanstalk. eb = Aws::ElasticBeanstalk::Client.new(region: 'us-west-2')
app = eb.describe_applications({application_names: [args[0]]})
if app.exists? puts "Name: #{app.application_name}" puts "Description: #{app.description}"
envs = eb.describe_environments({application_name: app.application_name}) puts "URL: #{envs.environments[0].cname}" end
